body: @scheibelp This pull request contains code to remove qt3 versus qt4/qt5 conflicts when building cbtf-argonavis-gui and solve issue #7946.    It creates an openspeedshop-utils package that does not depend on qt3 and can be used to resolve the needs of cbtf-argonavis-gui.    Changes for creating a release versus develop build path are also included.
title: Code to remove qt3 versus qt4/qt5 conflicts when building cbtf-argonavis-gui
